images.copyright: Mandarin duck, Richmond Park, London, England (© Oscar Dewhurst/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Who’s this colorful character?
images.caption: Mandarin duck, Richmond Park, London, England
images.desc: The cold, dreary backdrop of winter can be the perfect time to show off a little color. This male mandarin duck is doing just that with his handsome crest and vibrant plumage. Come molting season, he will look more like his brown-and-white female counterpart, except for his brightly colored beak.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
